build_id.description: Build ID of the failing binary

cpu_arch.description: One of the values from the Windows SYSTEM_INFO::wProcessorArchitecture field

launcher_error.description: The error that raised the launcher process failure

hresult.description: The HRESULT error code from the launcher failure

source_file.description: The leaf name of the source file where the failure originated

source_line.description: The line in the source code where the failure originated

memory.description: Information about the host computer's memory configuration

avail_page_file.description: Free space available in the page file, in bytes

avail_phys.description: Available physical memory on the machine, in bytes

avail_virt.description: Available virtual memory on the machine, in bytes

total_phys.description: Total physical memory on the machine, in bytes

items.description: Version number in the format major.minor.patch.build
Index into the signatures array indicating which signature this binary was signed with

modules.description: List of leaf names of all modules found in the launcher process at the time of failure

num_logical_cpus.description: The number of logical CPUs on the host machine

os_locale.description: The current user's OS locale setting

os_version.description: Windows version numnber in major.minor.build.UBR format (UBR is optional, only available on Win10)

security.description: Information about the security applications registered with Windows on the host computer

antispyware.description: Names of antispyware products registred on the host system

av.description: Names of antivirus products registred on the host system

firewall.description: Names of firewall products registred on the host system

server_os.description: True if this build was running atop a Windows Server OS

signatures.description: Array of all the signatures that were found during module enumeration

update_channel.description: Channel that this build was built for
